definition: a platform raised above the surrounding level to give prominence to the person on it, remove tree stumps from
details:
noun
- a platform raised above the surrounding level to give prominence to the person on it
= synonyms: rostrum
- (cricket) any of three upright wooden posts that form the wicket
- the part of a limb or tooth that remains after the rest is removed
- the base part of a tree that remains standing after the tree has been felled
= synonyms: tree stump
verb
- remove tree stumps from
= example: remove tree stumps from
- cause to be perplexed or confounded
= example: cause to be perplexed or confounded
= synonyms: mix up
- travel through a district and make political speeches
= example: travel through a district and make political speeches
- walk heavily
= synonyms: stomp
